body:
> My script adds corporations, if the email address in git/Gerrit maps to a corporate CLA.

That logic is not correct, at least to my understanding.

This is from a private discussion with @rsc:

>> It is unclear whether I should use my corporate e-mail or my personal
>> e-mail for corporate changes [...]
> 
> The Go project doesn't have a preference which email address you
> use. It is fine to use your personal email for all, or vice versa.
> [...] as long as they (corporations) have completed a CLA with us
> and put your name on it, we're good. And there's no need to identify
> each CL as one copyright holder or the other.
